publ: by 广东长虹电子有限公司
name: ChanghongSmartTVController
0:
”Alexa, set volume to 50 on smart TV”
”Alexa, change input to HDMI1 on smart TV”
”Alexa, mute on smart TV”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The skill can be used to control your TV using few simple commands. Link your skill to Alexa and skill makes it easy to enjoy shows, movies and streaming content on your Smart TV. You can play video and music, change channels, change volume, switch inputs, and more.The skill can be used to control various range of device ,such as UCK50G7N-Ui、UCK55G7N-Ui、UCK65G7N-Ui.This skill has the following function:
alexa, change input to HDMI1 on smart TV
alexa, change input to TV on smart TV
alexa, change input to Composite on smart TV
alexa, change input to Component on smart TV
alexa, change channel to 11 on smart TV
alexa, change channel to BBC on smart TV
alexa, next channel on smart TV
alexa, channel up on smart TV
alexa, channel down on smart TV
alexa, volume up on smart TV
alexa, volume down on smart TV
alexa, volume up by 20 on smart TV
alexa, volume down by 20 on smart TV
alexa, set volume to 50 on smart TV
alexa, mute on smart TV
alexa, unmute on smart TV
alexa,Play on smart TV
alexa,Pause on smart TV
alexa,Stop on smartTV
alexa,Fast Forward on smart TV
alexa,Rewind on smart TV
alexa, go to guide on smart TV
alexa, go to settings on smart TV
alexa, go home on smart TV
Alexa, Search [Baby shark] on Youtube
Alexa, Play [justin Bieber] on Youtube
